function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Particles of respiratory origin being resuspended from the floor","Impact":"Increased risk of infection if the particles carry viable pathogens","Mitigation":"Regular surface cleaning and disinfection to reduce the presence of viable pathogens on surfaces","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filtration systems for air purification","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Influence of inlet and outlet positions on particle deposition and airflow velocity","Impact":"Accumulative effect on particle deposition and airflow interaction","Mitigation":"Strategic positioning of inlet and outlet vents to optimize airflow and reduce particle deposition","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics (CFD) simulations for airflow optimization","People":"HVAC system engineers, building designers","Owner":"Building owners, HVAC system designers"},{"Description":"Comparison of ventilation supply systems in a hospital environment","Impact":"Potential for cross-infection from inhalation of droplet nuclei","Mitigation":"Implementation of the most effective ventilation supply system for reducing cross-infection","Technologies":"Ventilation system monitoring and control systems, differential pressure sensors for containment","People":"Patients, health care workers","Owner":"Hospital management"}]}
